item.title: Software Company Intro Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are a software company in need of a professional intro video to showcase our brand and services. The video should be around 1-2 minutes long and should incorporate our company logo and key messaging. We want the video to be visually appealing, engaging, and informative. It should highlight our software solutions, their benefits, and how they can help potential clients.

    Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Motion graphics
    - Animation
    - Storytelling
    - Adobe After Effects
    - Adobe Premiere Pro

    Size: medium
    Duration: under 1 month
    Expertise: intermediate

Budget: $100

Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video

item.title: "The Paint Explainer" Animation Course - Upwork
item.description:
We are running a YouTube agency managing various channels and seeking an experienced video editing expert to design and deliver a comprehensive training course for our client. You would be teaching this small class of 3, the distinct style used by the popular YouTube channel "The Paint Explainer."

Course Overview

The ideal candidate will create an in-depth curriculum covering the following key areas:
• 2D Animation Fundamentals
• Stick Figure Drawing & Animation Techniques
• Mastering Adobe Illustrator (Beginner to Advanced)
• Mastering Adobe After Effects (Beginner to Advanced)
• Mastering Adobe Premiere Pro (Beginner to Advanced)

Learning Outcomes

By the end of the training, the trainee should possess the skills to independently create engaging educational videos emulating the signature style of "The Paint Explainer."

Qualifications
• Proven experience creating videos in the style of "The Paint Explainer"
• Extensive knowledge of 2D animation, drawing, and relevant Adobe software
• Ability to structure an effective curriculum with practical exercises
• Confidence in training someone to produce higher-quality videos than "The Paint Explainer"
• Previous experience working on the "The Paint Explainer" channel is a major asset
• Entrepreneurial spirit with a desire to expand training/consulting services

Application Requirements
• Detailed course outline covering all topics listed above
• Links to a portfolio demonstrating relevant animation/video editing work
• Proposed timeline and pricing for course development/delivery
• Available for interviews and practical skills assessment

Do Not Apply If:
• You have previously turned down opportunities offered by us
• You have no prior experience creating videos in the signature style of "The Paint Explainer"
• You lack comprehensive expertise in 2D animation, drawing, and the listed Adobe software
• You are unwilling or unable to commit to developing and delivering a full curriculum

Project Price:
We have priced this project after reviewing the tutorials available on udemy, coursera & various institutes/universities in the US. However we can negotiate this further based on the time frame mutually decided.


Hourly Range: $50.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 08:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Illustrator, 2D Animation, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Illustration, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe Illustrator, 2D Animation, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Illustration, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Pakistan
click to apply

item.title: "Dumb Doggo Animation" Channel Style Training Course - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented animator and video editor to create a comprehensive online course for a class of 2 trainees. You will employ the playful and distinctive stick figure animation approach used by the popular "Dumb Doggo Animation" YouTube channel.

Course Scope
The chosen candidate will develop an immersive, multi-module curriculum including:
• Character Design & Development for Stick Figure Animation & 2D Animation
• Traditional Animation Foundations
• Digital Animation in Adobe Animate/Flash
• Rendering & Compositing in Adobe After Effects
• Video Editing & Finalization in Adobe Premiere Pro

Objectives
After completing this course, students will have the skills to conceptualize, animate, and produce professional-quality stick figure animated videos mirroring the endearing and humor-driven style of "Dumb Doggo Animation."

Your Qualifications
• Extensive portfolio showcasing stick figure animation matching "Dumb Doggo's" tone
• Expert-level fluency with Adobe's animation and video editing programs
• Proven ability to break down complex techniques into easy-to-follow lessons
• Background in storyboarding, scriptwriting, and comedy writing is a major plus
• Experience teaching animation or developing online courses before

What We Need
• Detailed course outline with module descriptions and draft lesson plans
• Sample videos/exercises demonstrating your relevant animation abilities
• Proposed timeline for course creation, filming/recording, and delivery
• Pricing for developing the full curriculum (flexible for the right candidate)
• Availability for a video interview and short animation test

We will NOT consider applicants who turned down a previously offered working opportunity, lack a strong portfolio and evidence they can faithfully recreate the iconic "Dumb Doggo Animation" style and sensibilities. Prior work on that channel is preferred but not required.


Hourly Range: $50.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 07:52 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Animated Explainer, Adobe Illustrator, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Animation, Motion Graphics
Skills: Animated Explainer, Adobe Illustrator, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Animation, Motion Graphics
Country: Pakistan
click to apply

item.title: NEEDED: Youtube Faceless Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Position Overview:
We're in search of a talented Content Creator to spearhead our faceless YouTube channel. This individual is expected to utilize stock images/footage and compile them into a video, following the script and voiceover. This individual MUST have extreme knowledge of You tube policies, especially copyright.

The genre would be social media drama pertaining to the latest scandals/rumors about well known influencers/streamers/celebrities. The ideal candidate would have a passion for these types of videos.

We are looking for around 20 minute videos


Responsibilities:
-Develop and implement a comprehensive content strategy tailored to our faceless YouTube channel, leveraging mediums such as animation, screen recording tutorials, voiceovers, and narrated content.
-Produce high-caliber videos utilizing top-tier recording and editing equipment, ensuring exceptional audio-visual quality.
-Establish a robust branding identity for the channel, encompassing channel name, logo design, and channel artwork.
-Create engaging and informative content that resonates with our target audience.
-Utilize voiceovers or text overlays effectively
-Create videos that have LONG retention times
-Promote video content across various platforms to broaden the channel's reach and cultivate audience growth.
-Maintain a consistent upload schedule to sustain viewer interest and engagement.

HOW TO APPLY:
please send us examples of videos that you have worked on!  We are not specific with the type of videos. It could range anywhere from history videos, true crime, to anime/manhwa recap videos. Also, please let us know the cost per per minute for a video.



Budget: $2,000
Posted On: June 24, 2024 07:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, YouTube Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager Reels Maker - Upwork
item.description:
**Job Title: SMM + Reels Creator**

**Company: TutorOne**

**Location: Remote**

** IG Page: /tutoroneca

**Position Type: Part-Time, Temporary (1-2 hours/day for a minimum of one month)**

---

**About Us:**
TutorOne is dedicated to providing top-notch educational support and tutoring services. We aim to create a strong online presence to reach and engage with students and parents effectively. Our Instagram page is currently in need of a strategic overhaul to improve its appeal and engagement.

**Job Description:**
We are seeking a creative and motivated Social Media Manager with exceptional video editing skills to revamp our Instagram presence. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for design, a deep understanding of social media trends, and the ability to create engaging video content that resonates with our audience.

**Responsibilities:**
- Review and analyze our current Instagram page to identify areas for improvement.
- Create a cohesive and visually appealing Instagram page with highlights and proper introductions.
- Watch hours of recorded videos to select the best snippets for Instagram posts.
- Edit videos to ensure they are engaging, especially within the first 3 seconds, to maximize views and shares.
- Develop and implement strategies to increase follower engagement and drive traffic to our website.
- Monitor performance and provide regular reports on the effectiveness of social media campaigns.
- Collaborate with the TutorOne team to align social media content with our brand and goals.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as a Social Media Manager, particularly with Instagram.
- Proficiency in video editing software and tools.
- Strong understanding of how to create viral content and the mechanics of social media algorithms.
- Excellent grasp of English, both written and spoken.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Attention to detail and a passion for creativity.

**What We Offer:**
- Competitive hourly rate, with fair pricing and a thorough review of your work to ensure fairness.
- Flexible working hours (1-2 hours/day).
- The opportunity to make a significant impact on our brand’s online presence.

**How to Apply:**
Please submit your resume, a cover letter detailing your relevant experience, and examples of your previous work in social media management and video editing to [email address].

**Application Deadline:** [Insert Deadline]

---

TutorOne is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 07:32 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Education, Facebook, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Content
Skills: Education, Facebook, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Content
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Dynamic VA Wanted for Editing & Curating Dog Videos on IG - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a proactive and creative Virtual Assistant to join our dynamic team, dedicated to discovering and sharing the most captivating dog-themed content on Instagram. If you have a knack for identifying viral trends and a passion for all things canine, this role is perfect for you!

Key Responsibilities:

Research Viral Content: Regularly scan platforms like TikTok, YouTube, and other dog-focused social media to identify trending and viral dog videos. Utilize tools and software to track trending hashtags, topics, and videos to stay current within the dog niche.

Content Curation and Management:

Excel Sheet Organization: Maintain an organized Excel spreadsheet detailing potential videos for reposting, including video URLs, brief descriptions, views, likes, and other relevant metrics to aid in selection processes.
Permissions and Credits: Manage communications with original content creators to secure repost permissions and ensure proper crediting, reinforcing our reputation and fostering a positive community.
Video Editing: Perform basic editing tasks such as cropping, adding watermarks, and inserting engaging captions or graphics to enhance the videos for our audience.

Scheduling and Posting: If needed, handle the scheduling of posts using tools like Buffer or Hootsuite to maintain a consistent and effective posting schedule that maximizes engagement.

Engagement and Analytics: Monitor video performance, analyze Instagram analytics, and adapt posting strategies based on content performance to continually engage and grow our audience.

Requirements:

Experience with social media management, particularly in content curation and video editing.
Strong organizational skills and proficiency in Excel.
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and as part of a remote team.


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 24, 2024 07:20 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Editing, Virtual Assistance, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Content Writing
Skills: Video Editing, Virtual Assistance, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Content Writing
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
